entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Grande-Quatre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:01 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -35.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande IV Airport 09:23 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High minus 28.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 50 this morning and minus 43 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
